Header.location: fixed on the top of the page
Header.description: header of the page containing quick buttons shortcuts

IconButton.description: contains toggle button to toggle the sidebar

SearchGlobal.location: to the right of the IconButton justified in right half
SearchGlobal.description: container element holding searchIcon , search type Input and a cross icon

SearchIcon.location: to the left in the container

StyledInputBase.location: to the right of the SearchIcon
StyledInputBase.description: input element where the user can search, which transists from the top of the screen in the mobile screen

CloseIcon.location: to the right in the component and to the right of the StyledInputBase component
CloseIcon.description: cross icon that clears the text that user inputs in the input field

MessagesDropdown.location: to the right of the SearchGlobal component
MessagesDropdown.description: button element that opens a popup for the messages received
